name: Starseeker Bibi: Cargo Chase!!
description:
Abandoned in the mid 90s, this homebrew arcade game found itself in "development hell" with the advent of the CD-ROM and ever-changing graphics standards. With few surviving assets including a ball-shaped character in a UFO and a selection of CG renders in then-fullscreen resolution, Hybrid Dragon Team took it upon themselves to restore and redraw the graphics and port it to a modern game engine. Featuring the works of ShrubbyFrog, Su Tolias, and HY, we bring you STARSEEKER BIBI: CARGO CHASE!!
DISCLAIMER: This software is freeware. If you purchased this game, standalone or in a bundle, you've been scammed!

CONTROLS:
- Joystick
- Start/Confirm Button
PLAYERS:
- Single Player

Note: Synopsis content above is rooted in fiction. This game is the sole work of Hybrid Dragon Team and mentioned members. Hybrid Dragon Team and its members reserve all rights to this property. The Unity game engine is property of Unity Technologies.
